name: github_create_issue
description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository with title, description, priority, and labels. Use this tool when you need to report bugs, request features, or create tasks.

title.description: The title of the issue. Should be concise and descriptive.

description.description: The detailed description/body of the issue. Supports markdown formatting.

priority.description: Priority level: 'high', 'medium', or 'low'. This will be added as a label.

labels.description: Additional labels to apply to the issue. Example: ['bug', 'documentation', 'help-wanted']

url.description: The URL of the created issue

title.description: The title of the created issue

state.description: The state of the created issue (typically 'open')
